Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides that commercial tugboats, barges and other commercial towboats are exempt from payment of the petroleum business tax
Summary: Provides that commercial tugboats, barges and other commercial towboats are exempt from payment of the petroleum business tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing an exemption from the payments of the petroleum business tax on the operation of commercial tugboats, barges and other commercial towboats
